body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Caution        Backcountry Camping Permit and Access Procedures  Alert 1 , Severity ,caution ,, Backcountry Camping Permit and Access Procedures   Reservations for required permits must be obtained through www.recreation.gov. Due to the breach at Old Inlet, access to both east and west wilderness camping zones must now be from Watch Hill or points west, and involve a 1½ to 8 mile hike. more
title: Fire Island National Seashore: Current Conditions
